location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 88 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports details of an engagement between the French - now landed at Kishme [Qeshm] Island - and forces of the Imam of Muscat which saw the French capture a vessel and kill 16 of the Imam's men. The French are also said to hold an English ship.
